key.name: container-scroll-to-switch-workspace
key.summary: Enable scrolling on the container to switch workspaces.
key.description: If other extensions allow scrolling anywhere on the panel to switch workspaces, enabling this can result in double inputs (one scroll equals two switches). This option exists to prevent such conflicts by allowing you to toggle this behavior.
